description: TRESemmé CONDITIONER ULTIMATE HYDRATION 350 MLTRESemmé Ultimate Hydration, with MOISTURE COMPLEX, quenches your dry, dull hair. Give your hair the hydration it needs to restore life back to your locks.Our MOISTURE COMPLEX, with Ceramides, nourish each strand with an intense boost of deep hydration, locking it in to leave hair feeling soft, refreshed and smooth after each use. Say bye to damaged and dry hair with TRESemmé Ultimate Hydration System**TRESemmé Ultimate Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo.NEED AN EXTRA BOOST OF PROTECTION?Use together with TRESemmé Ultimate Hydration Shampoo and add on using our Heat Defence Spray as a 'must have' to protect your hair from heat and prep it for styling.Goes Well With: TRESemmé Ultimate Hydration Shampoo OUR PHILOSOPHYFrom our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salonTRESemmé is dedicated to creating haircare products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylist and salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day.TRESemmé. Professional. At your fingertips.Ultimate Hydration with Moisture ComplexFormulated to hydrate dull, dry hairThe Moisture Complex with Ceramides infuses deep hydration to each locksLeaving hair smooth and soft after useUse it together with TRESemmé Ultimate Hydration Shampoo for best resultTRESemmé Pro-Collection Range - Professional Care in Your Hands
name: Tresemme Conditioner Ultimate Hydration 350mL
